attributes.action: accept that native British people have rights and requirements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British people have rights and requirements, regardless of how internationalised or multi-cultural or whatever other buzz words you wish to apply, these rights need to be protected.

Keep your focus on this country and only once you have solved issues here should you even consider assisting in international situations.

Regardless of how you want to spin or massage the figures we are in a benefits crisis the NHS is crippled and unemployment is way too high.

Stop accepting thousands of people a day into this country and spending billions abroad until the resident population is being serviced adequately

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
